name: Goffick Gurl Dressup
description:
Dress up Enoby Darkn'ess Dementia Raven Way in every outfit she wears hroughout the entirety of the ICONIC fanfic emo bible My Immortal! Features over 25 different outfits!

This game will continue to be updated with new content and features overtime, so feel free to comment suggestions! NO FLAMING OR STUPID PREPZ ALLOWED!!!

(Initial loading may take a while dpengind on your connection)

SPaciel fangz (geddit cuz im goffick_) to iamnotokay2000 on tumblr for imspiring this games bg with their room design: https://www.tumblr.com/myimmortalfan666/709542938546405376/i-didnt-know-where-in...

Music: My Immortal/Bring Me to Life (Nightcore Remix)
